question: Type your response. What is the final number in the array you created? Enter 0 to get the code to run and answer

answers.feedback: Incorrect. You don't have to guess. Get the value at the end of the array
The final number is 296, because it's not evenly divisible by 7. The correct code would be, for array X=np.arange(100,300,7) the final value would be at index -1, so X[-1]
